# superglue

> AI-native integration platform for glue code, migrations, and legacy system automation

## Introduction
[Introduction](/): Sync, migrate, integrate, and manage glue code

## Getting Started
[Concepts](/getting-started/core-concepts): Understanding superglue fundamentals
[LLM-driven Development](/getting-started/llm-driven-development): Enhance your AI coding experience with LLM-readable documentation
[Setup](/getting-started/setup): The 5 minute guide to building your first superglue tool

## Guides
[Creating a System](/guides/creating-a-system): Connect superglue to any system
[Creating a Tool](/guides/creating-a-tool): Create tools to connect your systems and do things
[Debugging a Tool](/guides/debugging-a-tool): Use the tool playground to debug your tool
[Deploying a Tool](/guides/deploying-a-tool): Execute tools on-demand, schedule them, or trigger via incoming webhooks
[Using Template Expressions](/guides/using-template-expressions): Understand how template expressions work across systems, tools, and steps.
[Using the Agent](/guides/using-the-agent): How to interact with the superglue agent

## SDK Reference
[Methods](/sdk/methods): Complete reference for all SDK methods
[Overview](/sdk/overview): Quick start with the superglue SDK
[Types](/sdk/types): TypeScript and Python type definitions for the superglue SDK

## MCP
[Using the MCP](/mcp/using-the-mcp): Use superglue tools in Cursor, Claude, and other MCP-compatible clients

## API Reference
[API Reference](/api/reference): Interactive API documentation with built-in testing

## Enterprise
[End Users](/enterprise/end-users): Let your users connect their own accounts to your AI application
[Metrics & Telemetry](/enterprise/metrics): Monitor your Superglue usage with Prometheus-compatible metrics
[Notifications](/enterprise/notifications): Get alerted when tool runs fail
[Permissioning](/enterprise/permissioning): Control tool access with restricted and unrestricted API keys
[Run History](/enterprise/run-history): Track every tool execution and debug failures with full context
[Scheduled Execution](/enterprise/scheduling): Automate tool execution with cron-based scheduling
[Tool Versioning](/enterprise/tool-versioning): Track changes and restore previous versions of your tools
[Incoming Webhooks](/enterprise/webhooks): Trigger tool execution from external services

## Optional
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/superglue-ai/superglue): Open source and self-hostable
[Discord Community](https://discord.gg/vUKnuhHtfW): Get help and share ideas
[Book a Demo](https://cal.com/superglue/superglue-demo): Talk to our team
